item.title: I Love 07 RS
item.dc:creator: @suber_man suber man
item.description:
@suber_man wrote:

I would like to support him but the point is that Jagex wont do that even if the whole Rs cummunity want it.
But lets hope that it will happen and we finally after so many years can play Runescape again and have fun.

item.title: I Love 07 RS
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Well I logged in to an old account I have and posted this:

Thenewshadow 
Edit

View in thread
11-Sep-2011 06:22:15
Last edited on 11-Sep-2011 06:24:05 by Thenewshadow
I haven’t logged in in years (since 2007 actually) but when I saw this I just had to post…

Firstly @DEAD CODE – you think Jagex just over right their revisions? Of course they are going to make backups… how do you think RSC exists…

@ I Love 07 RS, I love it too and I took the liberty of posting this topic on a popular RuneScape Private Server forum to help get you more recognition.

Quote:
I’d just love to go back and play what I loved, just like the RSC guys can.

It’s not fair that I don’t play RuneScape anymore, because I was so loyal for 7 years and now the people in between (old school RS2 players) have been forced to private servers.

RSC get their needs met, HD prods get their needs met. We get buggy private servers.

I support you so much, I don’t play RS anymore because it’s not the game I had the passion for.

Why do you think people love games like Sonic and Mario still? Because it’s old school, epic and lets us reminisce on the good old days.

It’s pretty ironic too that when you log in game almost 3/4s of the population are some form of bot, but when you log into the forums EVERYONE’S LEGIT! …

Read full topic

item.title: I Love 07 RS
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:3, topic:414264”]Fuck all that, I’d just love to go back and play what I loved, just like the RSC guys can.

It’s not fair that I don’t play RuneScape anymore, because I was so loyal for 7 years and now the people in between (old school RS2 players) have been forced to private servers.

RSC get their needs met, HD prods get their needs met. We get buggy private servers.[/quote]
Chassy is right. People don’t bot just to ruin the game. They bot because they are too lazy to play legit, or just don’t have the time, like myself. I go to school for 8 hours a day, then therapy for 2 more. Then I usually, (after a week or two go by), start to have a couple hours of homework each day. Then I only have a couple hours on the weekends to play runescape.
And with the way that the new generation of RS players are, they are just going to bitch and moan about anything that JaGex does to the game…

Read full topic

item.title: I Love 07 RS
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Trolls/idiots won’t stop if the old RuneScape is brought back…
Bots won’t stop if the old RuneScape is brought back…people bot because they are too lazy to play the game fairly or because the game is a giant waste of time anyway

By bringing back the old RuneScape you will only satisfy a small majority of people. I doubt they can just “bring it back” as well. Gold selling sites will continue, bots will continue, and the immature community will continue.

Read full topic
